format: Makefile / Shell script / Python mix (build recipe script)
description: This file is a build recipe for cross-compiling GCC, including configuration settings, build commands, installation steps, and build environment management. It appears to be a mix of a BitBake recipe (commonly used in Yocto Project/OpenEmbedded) with embedded shell and Python code used to control the build process.

methods.name: gcc_stash_builddir_fixrpaths
methods.description: Rewrites rpaths in the build directory to fix hardlinks and supports breaking hardlinks as required.

methods.name: do_gcc_stash_builddir
methods.description: Creates a stashed copy of the build directory, fixing file paths and headers.

methods.name: do_gcc_stash_builddir_setscene
methods.description: Sets the scene for the sstate cache after stashing build directory.
